about_the_game:
Note: Don't you like card games? However, this game is for you. If you do not want to switch to the card screen like classic strategy games, click on the automatic battle and the soldiers will fight on the screen like in the classic games that appear on the soldiers.

Complete the Reign Quest

In Run-O Games' first strategy game, the classic strategy drama of the century, you take control of a nation. Rule your country and gain freedom, become the ruler of the world with depth and historical consistency. Rewrite the history of the world and build a magnificent empire.

Historical Scene
Start on a map of the world in 1800. Choose any of the nations in Europe and rewrite the page of history. Play as historical rulers and other leaders.

Contribute the riches of the world to your key provinces and become a leader in trade.

Improve your soldiers, strengthen the cards in your hand.
It is in your hands to change the course of the war.
detailed_description:
Note: Don't you like card games? However, this game is for you. If you do not want to switch to the card screen like classic strategy games, click on the automatic battle and the soldiers will fight on the screen like in the classic games that appear on the soldiers.

Complete the Reign Quest

In Run-O Games' first strategy game, the classic strategy drama of the century, you take control of a nation. Rule your country and gain freedom, become the ruler of the world with depth and historical consistency. Rewrite the history of the world and build a magnificent empire.

Historical Scene
Start on a map of the world in 1800. Choose any of the nations in Europe and rewrite the page of history. Play as historical rulers and other leaders.

Contribute the riches of the world to your key provinces and become a leader in trade.

Improve your soldiers, strengthen the cards in your hand.
It is in your hands to change the course of the war.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 18.04 LTS (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2105 / AMD® FX 4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 / AMD® Radeon™ HD 5850
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 18.04 LTS (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3240 / AMD® FX 8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 560 Ti
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12 or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12 or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer

name: European Card Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2105 / AMD® FX 4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 / AMD® Radeon™ HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X- compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3240 / AMD® FX 8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 560 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X- compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
